comment: The class is easy with the textbook work and the discussion posts, but the tests are a different ball game. Her tests are difficult and so different from the class material in the textbook and the short robotic lectures. She also posts assignments late and she takes forever to respond to emails (or does not respond at all).
The exams in her course are extremely lecture/book-based. Even with studying it's hard to know what exactly will be on the exams and there are only three for the whole course.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: She was only at ksu for a year, but I'm writing this just in case she comes back. Don't take her. The class itself isn't that hard, but she's really bad at lecturing, her powerpoints never make sense, she's rarely accessible outside of class because she never answers emails. I wish I could write more but there's a character limit.
Dr. Chang is a nice person, but the course is very unorganized and does not have any sort of studying material for the tests that are super hard.

Dr. Chang provides the student with amazing lectures. Her tests are quite difficult so I recommend reading the textbook. She is a very caring teacher and responds to email fast. Overall I highly recommend!

Dr Chang is an amazing professor, even though I'm not going into the Psychology field I feel like a learned a lot from her. She engages well with students and will answer questions to the best of her ability. While attendance wasn't mandatory for my class I still feel it's important to go to lectures as a lot of stuff is gone over in every class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious
